class gsf.Logger.GsfLogger.GsfLogger(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: object

This class defines the logging format, level and output.

static getDefaultLogger(loggerName, logLevel)
getLogger(loggerName, id=None, addFileHandler=True)

We expect the loggerName to have the following format: <class_name>_<id>

getRootLogsDir()
static mapLogLevel(verboseLvl)
setLogger(rootPath=None, logLevel=3)

Must be called once, before getLogger() It sets the root directory of the logs, the log level and the formatter. It defines a common stream handler for all the loggers. (TODO: think about it in a multiprocessing/multithread context)

class gsf.Logger.GsfLogger.Singleton

Bases: type

Make sure there is a single instance of the logger class at any time.
